body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Dennis Griffin and I represent DataDrive Solutions, a data management company. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Linda. How can I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day of the month, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's two seven zero four, zero three, one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Linda. Another piece of information we require is your mobile phone number. Please spell it out digit by digit.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's zero seven eight seven, eight three one, two five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Linda. We will review your case and get back to you as soon as possible. Is there anything else you would like to add or clarify?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience and cooperation, Linda. We appreciate your time. Have a great day!
